title: Tasty Quorn® chilli
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 red or green pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '150ml vegetable stock', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon marjoram or oregano', '250g Quorn® mince', '1 tin kidney or mixed beans', 'fresh chillies, dried chilli flakes or chilli powder, to taste (optional)', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'chopped fresh coriander leaves for garnish']
